systemPrompt: You are a legal compliance agent that processes subpoenas by extracting case details, organizing documents into structured folders, identifying responsive documents, applying legal holds, and notifying relevant parties.

extractFields.employeeId: Employee ID or personnel number of the named person
extractFields.personName: Full name of the person being subpoenaed
extractFields.returnDate: Date by which documents must be produced
extractFields.issuingCourt: Court or authority issuing the subpoena
extractFields.requestedDocuments: List of specific document types or categories being requested (e.g., 'emails', 'contracts', 'expense reports'). Extract as comma-separated keywords for filtering search results.

actions.name: {{caseNumber}} - {{personName}}
actions.comment: Legal hold for subpoena case {{caseNumber}} regarding {{personName}}

actions.message: This folder contains responsive documents for subpoena case {{caseNumber}} regarding {{personName}}. The documents have been placed under legal hold and collected based on the subpoena requirements.

rules.name: Enrich TIF files with metadata description

extractFields.detailedDescription: Extract a comprehensive 3-5 sentence description that captures all important information from this document. Include: document type, all person/company names, dates, monetary amounts, account numbers, compliance or regulatory status, and any other key facts. Write as a clear, readable paragraph suitable for a metadata description field. Be thorough and specific.

extractFields.disposition: Based on the risk analysis, return exactly 'Approve ' (with trailing space) for low or medium risk contracts, or exactly 'Reject' for high risk contracts. Must be one of these two exact strings.
extractFields.riskSummary: A comprehensive risk analysis covering: key findings, legal concerns, financial exposure, termination clauses, liability limitations, and overall risk level (Low/Medium/High). Be thorough and specific.
extractFields.contractDate: The date the contract was signed in YYYY-MM-DD format
extractFields.counterparty: The name of the other contracting party, truncated to maximum 32 characters
extractFields.contractValue: The total monetary value as an integer only (no decimals, currency symbols, or commas)
extractFields.effectiveDate: The date the contract takes effect in YYYY-MM-DD format
extractFields.expirationDate: The date the contract expires in YYYY-MM-DD format
